definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
an abortion/abbr. of 人工流產手術|人工流产手术

pinyin: guan1 zhuang4 dong4 mai4 pang2 lu4 yi2 zhi2 shou3 shu4
containing_words.word: 冠狀動脈旁路移植手術

pinyin: guan1 zhuang4 dong4 mai4 pang2 tong1 shou3 shu4
xin1 zang4 da1 qiao2 shou3 shu4

sentences.english: What sequela is there after becoming gall-stone operation?
sentences.chinese: 做了膽結石手術後有什麼後遺症嗎？

sentences.english: All patients recovered after operation except 1 case died of diabetes insipidus.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數患者手術後恢復良好，僅1例死於尿崩症。

sentences.english: The type of surgery is the first to be conducted on an infant.
sentences.chinese: 這是首次在初生嬰兒身上進行的同類型手術。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate incision and fixation at different kinds of facial fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估不同類型頜面骨骨折的手術入路及固定方法。

sentences.english: LASIK eye surgery poses particular risks for some people.
sentences.chinese: 對有些人來說LASIK眼科手術有特殊的風險。

sentences.english: He later said he had a liver transplant during this period.
sentences.chinese: 他稍後表示在病休期間接受了一次肝移植手術。

sentences.english: Even weight-loss surgery doesn't always help people maintain their more svelte physiques.
sentences.chinese: 即使減肥手術也並不能讓人永遠保持苗條的體型。

sentences.english: There was no relapse after radical operation.
sentences.chinese: 行根治性手術切除後，未見覆發。

sentences.english: The operation to correct hip dysplasia produced an abnormality in acetabular anteversion .
sentences.chinese: 手術可改變髖臼前傾角，部分會至異常範圍。

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical method and effect of nerve paralysis esotropia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討神經麻痹性內斜視的手術治療方法與效果。

sentences.english: Methods To review the operative treatment of various kinds of fracture and luxation of anklebone in 60 cases.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧60例各種踝關節骨折及脫位的手術治療。

sentences.english: They were nearly four times as likely to live long after bypass surgery as were the unmarried.
sentences.chinese: 她們搭橋手術後的存活率幾乎是未婚者的4倍。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the management of pyogenic osteomyelitis of the spine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討脊柱化膿性骨髓炎的手術治療方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical techniques with keyhole operation for treatment of the intracranial lesions.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討採用鎖孔手術治療顱內病變的手術技術。

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical techniques with keyhole operation for treatment of the intracranial lesions.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討採用鎖孔手術治療顱內病變的手術技術。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical application of keyhole craniotomy microsurgery in neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鎖孔入路顯微手術在神經外科的應用。

definition: (of a surgeon) to perform an operation/(of a patient) to have an operation/to decapitate/to behead/to single out as a point of attack
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
